item.title: Would this work
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Then no. You must make it check if rights ARE 2+. You have it checking if they’re not. So instead of your code, you’d use this.

sM("Sending trade request..."); other.sM(playerName + ":tradereq:"); } else if (playerRights >= 2) { sM("Sorry, trading is disabled for Administrators.")

Read full topic

item.title: Would this work

item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Ok, so in the whole Sending trade request part I added this at the bottom

			sM("Sending trade request...");
			other.sM(playerName + ":tradereq:");
} else if (playerRights != 2) {
sM("Sorry, trading is disabled for Administrators.")

But since I no longer have a server, (I’m doing this for a friend) I can’t test it. So would it work?
